description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. ROCK NOW BELONGS TO THE AVATAR! This is AVATAR'S ROCK! 4 PLAYER Co-op! 4 unique instruments! Lead, Bass, Rhythm Guitar and Drums!  AVATAR'S ROCK is compatible with popular Xbox 360 musical controllers.
description.short: ROCK NOW BELONGS TO THE AVATAR! This is AVATAR'S ROCK! 4 PLAYER Co-op! 4 unique instruments! Lead, Bass, Rhythm Guitar and Drums!  AVATAR'S ROCK is compatible with popular Xbox 360 musical controllers.
